metadata.title: CVE-2020-15095 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: Versions of the npm CLI prior to 6.14.6 are vulnerable to an informationexposure vulnerability through log files. The CLI supports URLs like"<protocol>://[<user>[:<password>]@]<hostname>[:<port>][:][/]<path>". Thepassword value is not redacted and is printed to stdout and also to anygenerated log files.

criterions.comment: npm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
